Summary: Coming out of store with my son and we both witnessed mutiple red, orange, yellow,spheres
trends: There have been no other sightings in Runnemede
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsCame out of store ,my son looked up into the sky, He replyed mommy look at the red stuff in the sky,i looked up to see what he meant, the objects he was seeing were coming out in 3's and all would change color redish to orangish to yellowish from the western sky in a straight line,once they were over our heads or store they scattered as we entered our car there were more still coming from the western sky,we got a lil scared and drove towards home which was southbound,halfway back home they were still in the sky going east towards atlantic ocean ( the distance between my house and the store where we witnessed the event is about 2 miles or less),when i made a left turn at a signal light and had a chance to look up for the objects again they were gone , I am over 40 years of age this is no aircraft or crafts i have seen, It wasnt like i was starring at a light on a airplane, HECK NO ! THIS WAS NOT OF THAT TYPE, .
